Notes: Creates a group of animated palm tree leaves with collision. If the player Ground Pounds one of the leaves, it will swing at a faster rate.

Obj_arg0.Name: Use DemoSimpleCast?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it enables DemoSimpleCast functionality.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc. However, this requires Obj_arg0 to be set.
